title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 359.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 359.3 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part contains all requirements for the provision by
probation of Voluntary Assessment and Case Planning services in the Youth Part, for Adolescent Offenders and Juvenile Offenders, including pretrial release
services where probation departments provide such services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
359.3

Adopted

New

York State Register March 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 13, eff. 3/27/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
